 */export var UPDATE_CURRENT_CATEGORY='UPDATE_CURRENT_CATEGORY';/**

 */export var updateCurrentCategory=middleware(function(category){return{type:UPDATE_CURRENT_CATEGORY,category:category};},"Store/Category/Action/updateCurrentCategory\n");
